Package com.google.code.rees.scope

Interface Summary
ActionProvider Provides a Set of action classes for initializing configurations.
MonitoredContext<K,V> A serializable map that can be monitored for activity and destroyed when no longer active.
ScopeAdapterFactory A factory used by the ScopeManager for creating adapters for processing scopes.
ScopeManager Uses a ConversationManager and SessionManager to provide external frameworks with central manager for processing both the conversation and session scopes.
 

Class Summary
DefaultScopeManager The default implementation of the ScopeManager.
HashMonitoredContext<K,V> A Hash implementation of the MonitoredContext.
